description: Move data between binary and JSON properties

essential_properties.name: sourceKey
essential_properties.description: The name of the binary key to get data from. It is also possible to define deep keys by using dot-notation like for example: "level1.level2.currentKey".

essential_properties.name: destinationKey
essential_properties.description: The name the JSON key to copy data to. It is also possible to define deep keys by using dot-notation like for example: "level1.level2.newKey".

essential_properties.name: sourceKey
essential_properties.description: The name of the JSON key to get data from. It is also possible to define deep keys by using dot-notation like for example: "level1.level2.currentKey".

essential_properties.name: destinationKey
essential_properties.description: The name the binary key to copy data to. It is also possible to define deep keys by using dot-notation like for example: "level1.level2.newKey".
